titles.title: Providing for an annual independent financial and performance audit of the accounts and operations of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 2/23/1993--Introduced. Subjects the accounts and operations of the House of Representatives to an annual financial and performance audit conducted on a fiscal year basis by an independent accounting firm. Requires the Director of Nonlegislative and Financial Services to: (1) use a competitive bidding process to select the firm to conduct the audit; and (2) oversee the firm in conducting such audit.
